sentences.english: And the people went out， and spoiled the tents of the Syrians.
sentences.chinese: 众人就出去，掳掠亚兰人的营盘。

sentences.english: Then the people went out and plundered the camp of the Arameans.
sentences.chinese: 众人就出去，掳掠亚兰人的营盘。

sentences.english: When the Israelites returned from chasing the Philistines, they plundered their camp.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人追赶非利士人回来，就夺了他们的营盘。

sentences.english: And the children of Israel returned from chasing after the Philistines, and they spoiled their tents.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人追赶非利士人回来，就夺了他们的营盘。

sentences.english: At dusk they got up and went to the camp of the Arameans.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏的时候，他们起来往亚兰人的营盘去。
